markdownRemark.html: I'm now halfway through Jane McGonigal's SuperBetter and decided to check out the Ted Talk she did a couple years ago explaining some of the basis behind the book. If you are interested in living more gamefully but haven't quite committed to the book, check out the talk and see how you feel.

frontmatter.title: SuperBetter Ted Talk
